meanings.definition: (archaic) An expression of surprise or delight.
meanings.english_definition: An archaic exclamation of surprise or delight.

examples.translation: まあ、なんて嬉しい驚きでしょう！

etymology.value: Origin obscure. Possibly a corruption of "Lord-a-mercy" or a similar expression.

usage_notes.explanation: This term is very old-fashioned and rarely used in modern English. It is primarily found in older literature.

readability_explanation.text: This word is very rare and archaic, so it is unlikely to be encountered except in older literature. It expresses surprise or delight, similar to 'Good heavens!'
